SLACKIRC_NICKNAME.description: The IRC nickname of your slackirc bot (defaults to slackirc)

SLACKIRC_PASSWORD.description: The IRC password to for your slackirc bot

SLACKIRC_SERVER.description: The IRC server to connect to (defaults to chat.freenode.net)

SLACKIRC_TOKEN.description: The Slack API token for your slackirc bot

SLACKIRC_CHANNELS.description: A CSV channel mapping of slack channels to IRC channels. E.g. #general:#bevry,#docpad,#historyjs:#history.js
